name: L-PICOLA
body:
L-PICOLA is a distributed-memory, parallel code for creating fast, accurate, dark matter simulations.
* How parallel? Well we've run it on over 1000 processors without a hitch.
* How fast? Due to the algorithms used and coding, it is ~1000 times faster than an identical full N-Body simulation
* How accurate? We can reproduce the two and three-point clustering of dark matter to within 5% on all scales used for current BAO and RSD measurements.
